content.rendered: Reuben Segal is the Group COO and COO Offshore at AqualisBraemar and has over 20 years’ experience in the offshore and shipping sectors covering both engineering design and ship surveying. Mr Segal is a naval architect and has extensive recent global business development experience with a focus on design and construction of offshore oil and gas assets, including MODU and MOPU units from FEED through to yard delivery. He holds a Master’s degree in Engineering from the University of Newcastle. Mr Segal is a British citizen and resides in Dubai, UAE.

excerpt.rendered: Over 20 years’ experience in the offshore and shipping sectors covering both engineering design and ship surveying.
